Author: fishonthesun
Text: I'm home in a week and a day from today and I'm lowkey thinking about fasting the day before and drinking lots of coffee so I can get my true weight right when I get home but also I'm in recovery and still on the first step of eating at least once a day so if I fasted I'd basically be slapping my therapist and dietitian in the face!!! Oh god why am I like this!!

Author: petiteanakitty
Text: Be aware that weight fluctuates a LOT. Sometimes it'll seem you out on weight when you haven't, so don't fret if you are a few pounds this way or that, remaining sodium and water weight can make things spike and change at the drop of a hat.
